resources.string: No connection found. Please check your network configuration and retry.
You are using a different version from the server. The fruit name in both version must match. Please make updates accordingly.
Invalid stock location. Please check your configuration.
Unable to restore all data. Please update data before starting.
Unable to save session. You may lose tickets that were not paid already.
Unable to save catalog. Quitting the application may leave no products available.
Unable to save compositions. Quitting the application may leave compositions uneffective.
Unable to save tariff areas. Quitting the application may leave no area available.
Unable to save users. Quitting the application may prevent you to log in.
Unable to save customers. Quitting the application may leavo no customers available.
Unable to save cash state. Open/close date may be lost when leaving the application.
No cash found. Updating data may solve the problem
Unable to save receipts. You may lose them if you quit the application without sending the data to the server.
Unable to save places. You may lose them if you quit the application.
Unable to save stocks. You may not be able to check your stock you quit the application.
The synchronization failed partially or totally.
